nodes.text: The Nautical Star was a 30-meter-long Mon Calamari DeepWater-class light freighter.
It had controls for a number of non-Mon Calamari species, including Humans. It could handle up to 85 metric tons of cargo, and had a number of redundant systems, typical in Mon Calamari engineering.
The Nautical Star was able to operate in the vacuum of space, in atmosphere, and underwater. It was lightly armed with a pair of laser cannons.
